room_title: Escape room "Dining Room Caper" by Room to Escape in Fort Wayne
review: The customer service was awful when we complained about things not working right they were full of excuses! I do not recommend. They told us it was the hardest and we just didn't understand the puzzles! We were was so angry we just left !

room_title: Escape room "Dining Room Caper" by Room to Escape in Fort Wayne
review: Came to Room to Escape with my coworkers over the holiday break for some team bonding. We had an absolute blast! The staff was great. They explained everything in detail and also added to the fun.There were seven of us and we chose the Dining Room Caper, which was the most difficult. Bring your thinking cap with you but also your creative mind. Although we didn't escape we had so much fun in the hour!If you are looking for something to do in Fort Wayne, a team bonding activity or just fun for a group this is the place! I will definitely be returning soon.

room_title: Escape room "Dining Room Caper" by Room to Escape in Fort Wayne
review: Didn't make it out of the dining room caper, but had a fantastic time trying! Alicia was an amazing game master and everyone else was so sweet and welcoming!! Can't wait to go back!
